attributes.action: replace the proposed London 2012 Olympic logo with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the United Kingdom hosts the 2012 Olympics in London we have an excellent opportunity to showcase both our capital and our great nation as a whole.  Unfortunately we feel that the official logo that has been revealed is dreadful and has already become a symbol of ridicule across the world.  As a result we petition the Prime Minister to have this logo replaced with immediate effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
